data.title: Technology partners
data.text:
Dixa enables companies to deliver customer service as it is meant to be. We help customer service leaders to create effortless experiences that unlock loyalty. Dixa’s Conversational Customer Service Platform combines powerful AI with a human touch at scale and is trusted by brands like Interflora, On, and Too Good to Go.

Vipps MobilePay makes it very, very easy to pay and get paid! We’re one Nordic mobile wallet with two brands: Vipps in Norway, and MobilePay in Denmark and Finland. Together, we serve 11 million users and 400 000 business customers across the Nordics. As a Voyado customer, you can easily get your end-users to sign up to a customer loyalty club with Vipps MobilePay by a simple push to your phone. You can also show benefits or discounts that you’ve given to your end-users in the Vipps or MobilePay app. They get the overview they need to make better purchasing decisions!

Centric connect retailers and consumers so they engage successfully. With technology, the relationship and interaction between consumer and retailer can be strengthened and a retailer can realise an efficient supply chain to be successful. Our solutions erase the distinction between channels so that you can offer your customers perfect service, in the shop and online, right up to the front door.

For more than 20 years Askås have delivered its versatile, scalable and powerful e-commerce platform. Especially developed and designed with e-retailers and end consumers in mind to customers all over Sweden and rest of Scandinavia. Choose Askås – today and with the future in sight!

Introducing inretrn – the ultimate solution for managing returns. With our innovative return management platform, we’re redefining the return experience, making it faster, smoother, and more sustainable than ever. Our customizable workflows, lightning-speed refunds, and data-driven insights are revolutionizing returns, and making a positive impact on businesses and the planet.

Boost your business with ITX omnichannel customer cloud contact center solution that simplifies communication across all stakeholders externally and internally. Help your staff feel like a customer service superhero and treat your customers like VIP in everty interaction! Swicht beteween e-mail, social media, chat, live screen and video share to best serve your customers where they are, like never before. ITX helps you to invite all your customers to feel like home, an enable hyperpersonalized customer service also online. Sounds amazing but worried about complex implementations? Don’t be! This is a direct integration ready to get you started in no time.

Flowbox is a SaaS company offering a visual marketing platform to help brands leverage and distribute social content throughout the buyer journey to increase engagement, social proof and sales. Flowbox’s heart lies in how technology can help brands generate and use owned, paid, earned and user generated content for a more effective, converting and transparent marketing and e-commerce. Through our platform, our customers are able to collect, moderate and publish content to their website, online shop and social channels.

Lipscore is an indispensable tool for retailers, offering a high quantity of ratings and guaranteeing 100% authentic reviews. This provides a wealth of representative data, invaluable insights, and a powerful tool to enhance your business. The backend integration between Voyado and Lipscore enables the direct collection and management of ratings and reviews from your online and physical stores via the Voyado platform.

The best customer experiences are built with Zendesk. Their customer service and engagement products are powerful and flexible, and scale to meet the needs of any business. Making it easy to deliver a great experience for all customers that need support.

A middleware solution, Loyyo links partners in payments, loyalty, POS, e-commerce and other value-added services. They turn every non-cash payment into loyalty transactions, member identification and valuable insights. And Loyyo’s unique NFC passes for Apple and Google make them a great addition to a loyalty program.

Kindly is one of the leading chatbot platforms in the market that makes it easy to handle first-line support and drive automated sales. With Kindly you can build conversational experiences your shoppers and buyers deserve: from meet and greet to conversion and checkout, start the conversation with robust interactive technology now.

Videoly is a product video platform used by more than 500 online retailers and brands globally. We help improve shopping experiences by simplifying the process of finding, managing, embedding, and distributing videos. Whether you’re an online retailer or a brand aiming to display your videos, we help you enhance the presentation of your products through compelling video content.

Brink Commerce is a lightweight, high-performing, serverless, and headless eCommerce API, built for D2C brands and global retailers. Brink Commerce API is architected in a way that enables it to scale linearly without limitations within milliseconds. Brink Commerce is compatible with any front-end of your choosing and common 3rd party CMS, CRM, PIM, and ERP services through API.

Make your customer experience engaging and fun! Gamifiera adds the opportunity to easily launch your own customer community, a gamified loyalty and progression system, and a first-class Rating and review system. All personal customer attributes, interactions, and data are made available on the Voyado customer cards, adding brand new ways to segment and loyalize your customer base.
